openalex 0.0.5

Topics

topics.Rd

Topics used by OpenAlex

Usage

topics

Format

A data frame with 4516 rows and 9 variables:

id_topic

character the id for the topic

topic

character description of topic

description

character long form description of this topic cluster

id_subfield

character the id for the subfield of this topic

subfield

character description of the subfield

id_field

character the id of the field

field

character description of the field

id_domain

character the id of the domain

domain

character description of the domain

Details
